name: Static
summary:
If the opponent hita the user with a contact move, there is a 30% chance the opponent will be paralyzed.
	
	Outside battle, if the user is in the front of the party, the chances of finding an Electric-type Pokémon in the area increases by 50%.
viability: This works the same as Flame Body, but with paralysis instead of burning. The result is the same; Static is a very good ability, especially for slower Pokémon like Ampharos.
